name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior MES Engineer, I bring 8 years of robust experience in the full-stack development landscape, particularly within the healthcare and financial sectors. I am proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, enabling me to design and implement high-performance solutions. My technical expertise encompasses a variety of frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. In addition, I have extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring that my solutions are scalable and secure.

I have a strong understanding of critical industry standards such as **GMP**, **CSV**, and compliance requirements like **HIPAA**, **FHIR**, **PCI DSS**, and **SOC 2**. My hands-on experience in developing enterprise-grade platforms is complemented by my skills in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation.

Moreover, I am well-versed in integrating MES systems like **Opcenter**, **PharmaSuite**, and **POMS**. I excel in teamwork and communication, allowing me to collaborate effectively on complex projects. I also possess experience working with machine learning pipelines and workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, which adds value to my role in intelligent automation and predictive analytics.
